snippet: The cause is under investigation, but the circumstances were reminiscent of a string of serious bus accidents.
abstract: Crash of a tour bus on Interstate 95 in New Rochelle, NY, on return trip to New York City from a Connecticut casino is under way; circumstances are reminiscent of a string of serious tour bus accidents in recent years; no major injuries are reported.
lead_paragraph: The cause is under investigation, but the circumstances were reminiscent of a string of serious bus accidents.

headline.seo: Casino Bus Crashes on I-95 in New York, Causing Minor Injuries
headline.main: Casino Bus Crashes in New Rochelle; Injuries Are Minor
